name: Bala Plokami Link
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Raindrop seems to have a special connection with the Bala Plokami that was found in the Philita Underbelly. Raindrop was audibly excited at the sight of the Plokami and remains cheery in its presence. 
-
Requirements You are wearing Raindrop.
Effect Between you and Raindrop, you can control the Bala Plokami, allowing the use of abilities with the Bala Plokami trait. With the extra attention granted by Raindrop, you are able to use abilities with the *Concentrate* trait, as long as the ability has the *Bala Plokami* trait as well, even if you are usually incapable of using abilities with the *Concentrate* trait.
